item.description:
Learn about the 9 personality types of the Enneagram (Herb acts out the types with hats) with a focus toward how to make your relationships work optimally. By knowing the types you are relating to, and tweeking yourself to respond to the strengths of both your type and another's, you'll have more vibrancy in your interactions and more dynamic relationships.

Will be held at home of Paul Gerzon in Arlington. Call Herb 781 648 3737 or Paul, 781 507 1115 for more info.



7:30 to 9:30pm, Cost $25

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert with over 20 years experience teaching personality types workshops He is a relationship counselor and coach, working with individuals, couples and families, leads trainings in organizations and gives presentations and workshops throughout the world.

www.herbpearce.com (workshop schedule) and to sign up for his newsletter
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Enneagram Personality Types: Jazz Up Your Relationships
